title: Adorable singing dachshund turns music on while owner tries to get baby to sleep | Flipboard
text: Adorable singing dachshund turns music on while owner tries to get baby to sleep A funny video of a dachshund singing loudly while his owner is trying to get their baby to sleep has gone viral on TikTok.
